discovery_rule.name: GarbageCollector Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Find possible GarbageCollector types: ConcurrentMarkSweep Copy MarkSweepCompact ParNew PS MarkSweep PS Scavenge

item_prototype.name: GC {#JMXBEAN} accumulated time spent in collection
GC {#JMXBEAN} number of collections per second

discovery_rule.name: MemoryPool Discovery
discovery_rule.filter: {#JMXBEAN}:^(Par\ Survivor\ Space|Par\ Eden\ Space|CMS\ Old\ Gen|CMS\ Perm\ Gen|Code\ Cache|Perm\ Gen|PS\ Old\ Gen|PS\ Perm\ Gen|Tenured\ Gen)$
discovery_rule.description: Find possible MemoryPool types: CMS Old Gen CMS Perm Gen Code Cache Perm Gen PS Old Gen PS Perm Gen Tenured Gen

trigger.name: 70% Opened File Descriptor Count used on {HOSTNAME}
